data.comment: Today's referee, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo, has blown to start the match.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno is whistled for offside at Independencia.
Throw-in Goias.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Goias.
In the minute 9, Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Goias needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Goias at Independencia.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
Atletico Mineiro's Savio misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, Goias have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
In the minute 16, Atletico Mineiro's Savio gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 17, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Goias a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Guga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 20, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Goias a goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Savio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 21, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo blows against Goias's Rafael Moura for offside.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro surge into the attack at Independencia but Rever’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 24, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Gilberto is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 28, Heron (Goias) has replaced the possibly injured Gilberto.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 31, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Goias's half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 33, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Goias.
An attacking Atletico Mineiro player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Keno smashes in a penalty at Independencia. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Nathan is the scorer with a header!
Keno instrumental with a fine assist.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thiago Larghi (Goias) is making a second substitution, with Caju replacing Jefferson.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Goias's half.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Goias in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Throw-in for Goias at Independencia.
In the minute 54, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Goias's area.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro's Nathan breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 55, Goias have a goal kick.
Juan Pintado gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goias.
Savio for Atletico Mineiro is whistled offside.
In the minute 58, Goias have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's first substitution at Independencia with Allan replacing Nathan.
In the minute 61, Free kick in a good position for Atletico Mineiro!
Juan Pintado (Goias) gets a yellow card.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Guga. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 62, Rever for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Allan for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Goias a goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 69, Goias's Rafael Moura goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) has taken off Savio who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mailton is the replacement.
Attention is being given to Atletico Mineiro’s Savio and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 72, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Goias.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro's Mailton is caught offside.
In the minute 76, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Igor Rabello of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Goias at Independencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 78, Daniel Villalva is replacing Shaylon for the away team.
Marrony is replacing Eduardo Sasha for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Jair with Dylan Borrero. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
The home team have replaced Hyoran with Fabio Santos. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Goias a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Goias.
In the minute 84, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miguel Figueira is on a sub for David Duarte for Goias.
In the minute 86, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the away team a throw-in.
Keno hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Atletico Mineiro!
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 89, Throw-in Goias.
Allan for the home team is judged to be offside.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Goias throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Guilherme Arana has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Throw-in for Goias at Independencia.
Guilherme Arana gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Keno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
Guilherme Arana is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goal! Marrony extends Atletico Mineiro's lead to 3-0.
